definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Most muscle and spinal injuries are from overstrain .
sentences.chinese: 大多数肌肉损伤和脊椎的问题都来自用力过度。

sentences.english: He didn't hit out, but hit the wicket by a fluke.
sentences.chinese: 他并未用力击球，却歪打正着击中了三柱门。

sentences.english: Seven. You will feel this immediately in your arms.
sentences.chinese: 用力推，七，你的手臂很快就会有感觉。

sentences.english: Our breathing grew more rapid as we kissed deeper and harder.
sentences.chinese: 当我们吻得越深越用力，我们的呼吸会越急促。

sentences.english: The Man shut his eyes hard as the tears poured down his face.
sentences.chinese: 男人用力地闭上了眼睛，泪如泉涌。

sentences.english: He pushed hard up on the box.
sentences.chinese: 他用力向上推那个箱子。

sentences.english: Moreover, the reactive force between slab and roller is obtained in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还得出了铸坯对夹辊的作用力。

sentences.english: The applied force and the riveting time are selected.
sentences.chinese: 铆接的作用力和铆接时间都是可以调节的。

sentences.english: Even though his sons tried, they couldn't straighten them out.
sentences.chinese: 不管他的儿子们怎么用力，照旧不能把它们弄直。

sentences.english: Rub hands together to make a lather and scrub all surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 搓手产生肥皂沫，用力擦洗所有表面。

sentences.english: He knocked firmly on the door.
He lifted at a heavy stone lion.
sentences.chinese: 他用力举起一座沉重的石狮子。

sentences.english: He moved the stone with force.
sentences.chinese: 他用力搬开了那块石头。

sentences.english: He blew upon the traveler and removed from him his hat.
sentences.chinese: 他用力朝旅客身上吹风，把他的帽子吹了下来。

sentences.english: A man came and slammed the turtle out fall.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉子走过来，用力把海龟翻个四脚朝天。

sentences.english: The generalized active forces of the beam are applied forces of the moving support and elastic forces of the beam.
sentences.chinese: 梁的广义主动力取为动支承的作用力和弹性力。

definition: to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
to relinquish one's grip/to let go
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
